attributes.action: I would like to change my vote from Leave to Remain.
attributes.additional_details:
The result of the referendum was a 52%-48% split between Leave and Remain with 1,269,501 more votes to Leave. If the number of signatures on this petition exceeds 634,750, a second referendum should be held on the UK's membership in the EU. 

The Leave campaign made dozens of lies and false promises that they cannot deliver and so have broken the terms on which many voted Leave. We, the signees, would like our votes changed, or a second referendum held, given this new information.
attributes.background: Many of us feel we were lied to, fed mis-leading information and given false promises by the Leave campaign during the EU referendum. The signees of this petition declare they would like their vote from Leave to Remain given the fraudulent actions of the Leave campaign.
